events.name: Colorado Avalanche at Vegas Golden Knights

headlines.description: — Martin Necas celebrated his new contract with a goal and two assists, helping the Colorado Avalanche beat the Vegas Golden Knights 4-2 on Friday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Martin Necas shines with 3 points in Avalanche's 4-2 win over Golden Knights

events.name: New York Islanders at Washington Capitals

headlines.description: — Bo Horvat scored with 15:31 remaining in the third period to lift the New York Islanders to a 3-1 victory over the Washington Capitals on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: No milestone against the Islanders this time: New York tops Caps 3-1, keeps Ovechkin at 899

events.name: Detroit Red Wings at Anaheim Ducks

headlines.description: — Troy Terry scored two goals and added an assist to lead the Anaheim Ducks to a 5-2 win over the Detroit Red Wings on Friday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Troy Terry scores twice as Ducks beat Red Wings 5-2
